text: And reference it in http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_functional_connectivity_software and in http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_neuroimaging_software.
title: Create a wikipedia page for nilearn
Create a wikipedia page for nilearn

text:
I am not sure it is worth creating a wikipedia page. I would just add a
reference on the pages on neuroimaging software.
For me, it is a way to look more "serious" (even if the page is small) and it is the only way to get a link to the website.
Page not created but nilearn referenced in the software lists.
No problem, I wanted to get rid of these annoying Wikipedia tabs in my browser ;).
